content: the top to sit on your waist minus the 3 5 inches the scalloped lace edging for the sample size i created a fsc of 37 multiple of 6+1 for my desired measurement from above breasts to upper waist see below if you do not know how to create a fsc chain 2 insert your hook in the 2nd chain from hook pull up a loop yo draw through 1 loop this will be the chain yo draw through 2 loops left on the hook this is the single_crochet *insert your hook under the 2 loops of the chain stitch you created on the last stitch and pull up a loop yo draw through 1 loop 2nd chain yo over and draw through the last 2 loops on the hook this is your 2nd single_crochet repeat ** until the number of fsc you need step 2 1st row of repeat wrong side facing up chain 1 never counts as a stitch and turn your work place 1 half_double_crochet into each stitch across 37 half_double_crochet step 3 2nd row of repeat right side facing up chain 1 turn your work and place 1 half_double_crochet into the back loop only of the 1st stitch repeat placing 1 half_double_crochet into each back loop stitch across 37 half_double_crochet step 4 3rd row of repeat wrong side facing up chain 1 turn your work and place 1 single_crochet into the 1st stitch *skip 2 shell skip 2 1 single_crochet* repeat ** across and place 1 single_crochet into last stitch 37 stitches step 5 4th row of repeat right way facing up chain 3 always counts as 1st double_crochet and turn you work place 2 double_crochet into the 1st stitch 3 double_crochet *skip 2 1 single_crochet skip 2 shell* repeat across and place 3 double_crochet into the last stitch 37 stitches step 6 repeating repeat steps 2-5 until desired length of your bust measurement minus 8 inches and finish your last row on row 2 of the repeat step 3 and do not cut off your yarn tip the stitch pattern has some stretch to it so make sure to check for size as you go for the sample size i created 46 row of the repeat ending on row 2 step 3 this met 21 inches in length and 23 inches once stretched and my bust measurement is 31 inches step 7 setup row for scalloped lace edging right side facing up chain 1 and turn your work so you are now facing the long side of your top panel bottom of your top and right side facing up place 1 single_crochet into the 1st available space and repeat placing 1 single_crochet across the bottom into each available space you need to make sure that you place a multiple of 24 +1 single_crochet for the lace repeat to work 24 is a large multiple so i have added a guide on how many single_crochet you should add for different bust
